Name: Kriegsfront Battlescaper - Diorama Editor
About the game: Kriegsfront Battlescaper is a free utility tool / mecha-diorama-building-toy where you can create battlefield dioramas using built-in photo mode, mecha builder, and level editor. This is based on the development and modding tool for our upcoming mecha turn-based tactics game, Kriegsfront Tactics. Mecha Editor: - Create and design your own Krieger Mecha. - Mix-and-match various mech body parts to create your own unique Krieger. - Customize the look of your Krieger using color, patterns, materials, etc. - Arm your Krieger with an arsenal of weapons and artillery. Level Editor: - Use various terraforming tools to create your own battlefield diorama. - Place props and objects to add more details. - Utilize the Photo Mode to take action shots.
